data.oai_dc:dc: Individual gene trees of Synodontis relationships inferred from Bayesian analyses for a) mitochondrial Cytochrome oxidase I (COI), b) mitochondrial Cytochrome b (Cyt b + tRNA-pro), c) nuclear S7 ribosomal protein intron 1 and 2 (S7) and d) nuclear recombination activating gene (Rag 2). Taxa are colour coded according to the biogeographical clade they nest within based on Figure 2: purple, Congo Basin, blue, East Africa, green, West Africa (light green WA NS, dark green WA LGF). BPP values include black circle: >85%, black square 70-84%.
